Customizing CITE


Customizing CITE

There are a few things you could customize using CITE. For a list of variables you could change try the "Options" toolbar button.

For example in my .emacs file I have the following code right after the (load-file "/usr/lib/cite/xemacs-elisp/cite.elc") line. This customizes my environment to not have the Vi Menu on my menubar as well as not bringing up a shell window on startup. 

      (add-hook 'cite-hook (function (lambda ()
                                        (setq cite-shell-on-startup "FALSE")
                                        (setq cite-vi-menu-showing "FALSE"))))

Suresh Srinivas (ssuresh@mti)
